cat.gencat.ctti.canigo.arch.security.saml.validation.metadata

Class AbstractSAMLIdPMetadata

  • java.lang.Object
    • cat.gencat.ctti.canigo.arch.security.saml.validation.metadata.AbstractSAMLIdPMetadata
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SAMLIdPMetadata
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SAMLIdPFilesystemMetadata, SAMLIdPHTTPMetadata, SAMLIdPResourceMetadata

    public abstract class AbstractSAMLIdPMetadata
extends Object
implements SAMLIdPMetadata
    Abstract class providing the common tasks of classes that implement SAMLIdPMetadata. By design the classes extending from this will implement a method for obtaining a as the internal metadata resolver. Static metadata resolvers go out of sync whenever certificates expire and there are automatic or manual certicificate rollovers.
    Author:
    cscanigo
